    <script>
        (() => {
            document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
                const NON_FILTER_PARAMS = [
                    'all_filters_removed',
                    'clear_view',
                    'per_page',
                    'saved_view',
                    'sort',
                    'table_changes_pending',
                ];

                /**
                 * Insert given `element` as `parent`'s first child.
                 * @param {HTMLElement} element - Element to be inserted.
                 * @param {HTMLElement} parent - Parent container for given `element`.
                 * @returns {void} Do not return any value, modify DOM in-place.
                 */
                const insertFirst = (element, parent) => {
                    parent.hasChildNodes() ? parent.insertBefore(element, parent.firstElementChild) : parent.appendChild(element);
                };

                /**
                 * Get HTML elements for default and dynamic filter forms.
                 * @returns {object} Object with `defaultFilterForm` and `dynamicFilterForm` HTML elements or `null`,
                 *   depending on their actual existence in the DOM.
                 */
                const getFilterForms = () => ({
                    defaultFilterForm: document.querySelector('#default-filter form'),
                    dynamicFilterForm: document.querySelector('#dynamic-filter-form'),
                });

                const prepopulateFilterSelectsFromURL = (() => {
                    const { defaultFilterForm } = getFilterForms();
                    const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
                    // Only target Select2 controls inside the default filter form.
                    [...defaultFilterForm.querySelectorAll('select.nautobot-select2-multi-value-char')].forEach((el) => {
                        const name = el.getAttribute('name');
                        if (!name) { return; }
                        const values = urlParams.getAll(name);
                        if (!values.length) { return; }
                        values.forEach((val) => {
                            let found = Array.prototype.find.call(el.options, (opt) => {
                                return String(opt.value) === String(val);
                            });
                            if (found) {
                                found.selected = true;
                            } else {
                                el.add(new Option(val, val, true, true));
                            }
                        });
                        if (window.jQuery && $(el).data('select2')) {
                            $(el).trigger('change');
                        }
                    });
                })();

                /**
                 * Synchronize given `filter` value from default to dynamic filter form.
                 * @param {string} name - Filter name.
                 * @returns {void} Do not return any value, just set given field values.
                 */
                const syncDefaultToDynamic = (name) => {
                    const { defaultFilterForm } = getFilterForms();

                    const field = defaultFilterForm.querySelector(`[name="${name}"]`);
                    const text = field?.closest('.nb-form-group')?.querySelector('label')?.innerText?.trim();
                    /*
                     * `manageDynamicFilter` takes an array of `{ text: string, value: string }` objects as `value`, so
                     * regardless of field being a textbox, a single or multiple choice combobox, conversion is required:
                     *   1. For combobox (i.e. `<select>`), iterate over selected options and map them to display `text`
                     *     and underlying `value`.
                     *   2. For textbox (i.e. `<input>` or `<textarea>`):
                     *     1. Use entered value as both display `text` and underlying `value`.
                     *     2. If field is empty, use an empty array.
                     */
                    const value =
                        field?.tagName === 'SELECT'
                        ? [...field.selectedOptions].map((option) => ({ text: option.innerText, value: option.value }))
                        : [...(field?.value ? [{ text: field.value, value: field.value }] : [])];

                    manageDynamicFilter({ action: 'set', name, text, value });
                };

                /**
                 * Synchronize given `filter` value from dynamic to default filter form.
                 * @param {string} name - Filter name.
                 * @returns {void} Do not return any value, just set given field values.
                 */
                const syncDynamicToDefault = (name) => {
                    const { defaultFilterForm, dynamicFilterForm } = getFilterForms();

                    const current = [...dynamicFilterForm.querySelectorAll(`input[name="${name}"][type="hidden"]`)].map(
                        (input) => ({
                            text: [...(input.parentElement?.childNodes ?? [])].find((node) => node.nodeName === '#text')?.wholeText,
                            value: input.getAttribute('value'),
                        }),
                    );

                    const sync = defaultFilterForm?.querySelector(`[name=${name}]`);

                    if (sync?.tagName === 'INPUT' || sync?.tagName === 'TEXTAREA') {
                        sync.value = current.length > 0 ? current[0].value : '';
                    } else if (sync?.tagName === 'SELECT') {
                        window.nb.select2.setSelect2Value(sync, current);
                    }
                };

                /**
                 * Manage dynamic filter either by adding values to the existing selection or by setting passed values
                 * regardless of previous selection.
                 * @param {'add'|'set'} action - Use `'add'` to add given value to the existing selection; use `'set'`
                 *   to set given value regardless of what was set previously.
                 * @param {string} name - Filter field name.
                 * @param {string} text - Filter display text.
                 * @param {object[]} value - Array of objects containing `text` and `value` key-value pairs.
                 */
                const manageDynamicFilter = ({ action, name, text, value }) => {
                    const { dynamicFilterForm } = getFilterForms();
                    const items = dynamicFilterForm.querySelector('.nb-dynamic-filter-items');

                    const group = (() => {
                        const existing = items.querySelector(`.nb-multi-badge[data-nb-field="${name}"]`);
                        if (existing) {
                            return existing;
                        }

                        const group = document.createElement('span');
                        group.classList.toggle('badge', true);
                        group.classList.toggle('nb-multi-badge', true);
                        group.setAttribute('data-nb-field', name);

                        const button = document.createElement('button');
                        button.classList.toggle('nb-dynamic-filter-remove', true);
                        button.setAttribute('type', 'button');

                        const close = document.createElement('span');
                        close.classList.toggle('mdi', true);
                        close.classList.toggle('mdi-close', true);
                        close.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true');

                        const remove = document.createElement('span');
                        remove.classList.toggle('visually-hidden', true);
                        remove.innerText = 'Remove All';

                        const children = document.createElement('span');
                        children.classList.toggle('nb-multi-badge-items', true);

                        button.appendChild(close);
                        button.appendChild(remove);
                        group.appendChild(button);
                        group.insertAdjacentText('beforeend', `${text}:`);
                        group.appendChild(children);

                        return group;
                    })();

                    const children = group.querySelector('.nb-multi-badge-items');
                    const existing = [...children.querySelectorAll('.badge[data-nb-value]')];

                    /*
                     * Depending on `action` remove the following badges:
                     *   1. For `'add'`, remove already existing filters with the same key-value pairs and re-create them later.
                     *   2. For `'set'`, remove all existing filters of given key and apply only these passed as `values`.
                     */
                    const badgesToRemove =
                        action === 'add'
                        ? existing.filter((badge) => value.some((item) => badge.getAttribute('data-nb-value') === item.value))
                        : existing;
                    badgesToRemove.forEach((item) => children.removeChild(item));

                    value.forEach(({ text, value }) => {
                        const badge = document.createElement('span');
                        badge.classList.toggle('badge', true);
                        badge.setAttribute('data-nb-value', value);

                        const input = document.createElement('input');
                        input.setAttribute('name', name);
                        input.setAttribute('type', 'hidden');
                        input.setAttribute('value', value);

                        const button = document.createElement('button');
                        button.classList.toggle('nb-dynamic-filter-remove', true);
                        button.setAttribute('type', 'button');

                        const close = document.createElement('span');
                        close.classList.toggle('mdi', true);
                        close.classList.toggle('mdi-close', true);
                        close.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true');

                        const remove = document.createElement('span');
                        remove.classList.toggle('visually-hidden', true);
                        remove.innerText = 'Remove';

                        button.appendChild(close);
                        button.appendChild(remove);
                        badge.appendChild(button);
                        badge.insertAdjacentText('beforeend', text);
                        badge.appendChild(input);

                        insertFirst(badge, children);
                    });

                    // If group already exists, remove it and later insert as the first child.
                    if (items.contains(group)) {
                        items.removeChild(group);
                    }

                    if (children.hasChildNodes()) {
                        insertFirst(group, items);
                    }
                };

                document.addEventListener('click', (event) => {
                    const { defaultFilterForm, dynamicFilterForm } = getFilterForms();

                    const add = event.target.closest('button.nb-dynamic-filter-add');
                    if (add) {
                        const field = dynamicFilterForm.querySelector('[name$="lookup_field"]');
                        const type = dynamicFilterForm.querySelector('[name$="lookup_type"]');
                        const value = [...dynamicFilterForm.querySelectorAll('.nb-form-group')]
                            .pop()
                        ?.querySelector('input, select, textarea');

                        const isMissing = (control) =>
                        control?.selectedOptions ? control.selectedOptions.length === 0 : !control?.value;
                        if (isMissing(field) || isMissing(type) || isMissing(value)) {
                            // Return early if selected filter is not complete (i.e. is missing lookup field, type or value).
                            return;
                        }

                        const name = type.selectedOptions[0].value;
                        const label = field.selectedOptions[0].innerText.trim();
                        const suffix = type.selectedOptions[0].innerText.trim();
                        const text = /\(\w+\)/.test(suffix) ? `${label} ${suffix}` : label;
                        const values =
                            value?.getAttribute('multiple') !== null
                            ? [...value.selectedOptions].map((option) => ({ text: option.innerText.trim(), value: option.value }))
                            : [{ text: value?.value, value: value?.value }];

                        // If field exists in default filter form and is a single value input, use `'set'` action.
                        const action =
                            defaultFilterForm.querySelector(`[name="${name}"]`) &&
                        (value.tagName === 'INPUT' || value.tagName === 'TEXTAREA')
                            ? 'set'
                            : 'add';
                        manageDynamicFilter({ action, name, text, value: values });

                        syncDynamicToDefault(name);
                    }

                    const remove = event.target.closest('button.nb-dynamic-filter-remove');
                    if (remove) {
                        const badge = remove.closest('.badge');
                        /*
                         * Remove the group badge (i.e. multi-badge) when given badge is the group badge itself, or it is the only
                         * one left in the group (i.e. has no siblings) because removing it will leave the group badge empty anyway.
                         */
                        const shouldRemoveGroup =
                            badge?.classList.contains('nb-multi-badge') ||
                        (!badge?.previousElementSibling && !badge?.nextElementSibling);
                        shouldRemoveGroup ? badge?.closest('.nb-multi-badge')?.remove() : badge?.remove();

                        syncDynamicToDefault(badge?.querySelector('input[type="hidden"]')?.getAttribute('name'));
                    }
                });

                // Need to wrap `document` with jQuery to be able to listen to Select2 `change` event.
                $(document).on('change', (event) => {
                    const { defaultFilterForm } = getFilterForms();
                    const isDefaultFilterFormField = event.target.form === defaultFilterForm;
                    if (isDefaultFilterFormField) {
                        syncDefaultToDynamic(event.target.name);
                    }
                });

                // Need to wrap `document` with jQuery to be able to listen to Select2 `change` event.
                $(document).on('change', async (event) => {
                    const isLookupType = event.target.getAttribute('name')?.endsWith('lookup_type');
                    if (isLookupType) {
                        const content_type = event.target.getAttribute('data-contenttype');
                        const field_name = event.target.value;
                        const value = [...event.target.form.querySelectorAll('.nb-form-group')]
                            .pop()
                        ?.querySelector('input, select, textarea');

                        if (field_name) {
                            const replacement = await (async () => {
                                try {
                                    const response = await window.fetch(
                                        `/api/ui/core/filterset-fields/lookup-value-dom-element/?${new URLSearchParams({ content_type, field_name })}`,
                                        { method: 'GET', headers: { Accept: '*/*' } },
                                    );

                                    const html = await response.json();

                                    const element = document.createElement('div');
                                    element.innerHTML = html;

                                    return element.firstElementChild;
                                } catch (exception) {
                                    // Default to `<input type="text" ...>` field if error occurs.
                                    const input = document.createElement('input');
                                    input.classList.toggle('lookup_value-input', true);
                                    input.classList.toggle('form-control', true);
                                    input.setAttribute('id', `id_for_${field_name}`);
                                    input.setAttribute('name', field_name);
                                    input.setAttribute('type', 'text');
                                    return input;
                                }
                            })();

                            value.replaceWith(replacement);
                            replacement.nextElementSibling?.remove(); // Remove Select2 widget if present.
                            replacement.previousElementSibling?.setAttribute('for', replacement.getAttribute('id')); // Set label `for` attribute to match field `id`.
                            initializeInputs(replacement.parentElement);
                        }
                    }
                });

                // Need to wrap `document` with jQuery to be able to listen to Select2 `change` event.
                $(document).on('change', (event) => {
                    const isLookupField = event.target.getAttribute('name')?.endsWith('lookup_field');
                    const isLookupType = event.target.getAttribute('name')?.endsWith('lookup_type');

                    if (isLookupField) {
                        const type = event.target.form.querySelector('[name$="lookup_type"]');
                        $(type).val(null).trigger('change');
                    }

                    if (isLookupField || isLookupType) {
                        const value = [...event.target.form.querySelectorAll('.nb-form-group')]
                            .pop()
                        ?.querySelector('input, select, textarea');

                        if (value.tagName === 'SELECT') {
                            $(value).val(null).trigger('change');
                        } else {
                            value.value = '';
                        }
                    }
                });

                const isFilterForm = (target) => Boolean(target?.closest('#FilterForm_drawer'));

                document.addEventListener('reset', (event) => {
                    if (isFilterForm(event.target)) {
                        event.preventDefault();

                        // Remove all filter query params from location search while keeping non-filter params intact.
                        const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
                        const nextSearchParams = new URLSearchParams([
                            ...[...searchParams].filter(
                                ([property]) => NON_FILTER_PARAMS.includes(property) && property !== 'all_filters_removed',
                            ),
                            ['all_filters_removed', 'true'],
                        ]);

                        location.assign(`?${nextSearchParams}`);
                    }
                });

                document.addEventListener('submit', (event) => {
                    if (isFilterForm(event.target)) {
                        event.preventDefault();

                        const { defaultFilterForm, dynamicFilterForm } = getFilterForms();

                        /*
                         * Just before the form submission automatically add filter selected in "Advanced" tab (if any)
                         * which hasn't been manually applied for whatever reason (usually forgetfulness, speed, etc.).
                         * This is a requested UX flavor.
                         */
                        const add = dynamicFilterForm.querySelector('button.nb-dynamic-filter-add');
                        add.click();

                        // Remove all field names which are not applied filters container descendants.
                        [...dynamicFilterForm.querySelectorAll('input, select, textarea')].forEach((field) =>
                            field.closest('.nb-dynamic-filter-items') ? undefined : field.removeAttribute('name'),
                        );

                        /*
                         * Get the serialized data from the forms and:
                         *   1) Filter out query params which values are empty e.g `?sam=&dan=2` becomes `dan=2`.
                         *   2) Combine the two forms into a single set of data without duplicate entries.
                         */
                        const defaultFilterFormSearchParams = new URLSearchParams(new FormData(defaultFilterForm));
                        const dynamicFilterFormSearchParams = new URLSearchParams(new FormData(dynamicFilterForm));
                        const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);

                        const nextSearchParams = new URLSearchParams([
                            ...[...defaultFilterFormSearchParams].filter(([, value]) => value !== ''),
                            ...[...dynamicFilterFormSearchParams].filter(
                                ([property, value]) => value !== '' && !defaultFilterFormSearchParams.has(property, value),
                            ),
                            ...[...searchParams].filter(
                                ([property]) => NON_FILTER_PARAMS.includes(property) && property !== 'all_filters_removed',
                            ),
                        ]);

                        if (nextSearchParams.has('saved_view')) {
                            const all_filters_removed = [...nextSearchParams].every(([property]) =>
                                NON_FILTER_PARAMS.includes(property),
                            );

                            if (all_filters_removed) {
                                nextSearchParams.set('all_filters_removed', 'true');
                            }
                        }

                        location.assign(`?${nextSearchParams}`);
                    }
                });

                const onSubmitOrReset = (event) => (isFilterForm(event.target) ? window.nb?.history?.saveState() : undefined);
                document.addEventListener('reset', onSubmitOrReset);
                document.addEventListener('submit', onSubmitOrReset);
            });
        })();
    </script>


    
        


<section class="nb-drawer" tabindex="-1" id="OSPFConfigurationTable_config">
    <div class="nb-drawer-header">
        <h1>Table Configuration</h1>
        <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-nb-dismiss="drawer" aria-label="Close"></button>
    </div>
    <div class="nb-drawer-body">
        <form class="userconfigform h-100 pb-20 px-20 vstack" data-config-root="tables.OSPFConfigurationTable">

                        </a>
                    </div>

                <input type="submit" class="btn btn-danger reset" value="Reset">
            </div>

    </div>
</section>


    <script>
        (() => {
            document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
                document.addEventListener('submit', (event) => {
                    if (event.target.closest('#OSPFConfigurationTable_config')) {
                        // Keep the drawer open after page reload caused by form submission.
                        window.nb.history.saveState();
                    }
                });
            });
        })();
    </script>

        <form action="/search/" class="col-4 text-center" id="header_search" method="get" role="search">
            <label class="position-relative w-100">
                <input
                    aria-placeholder="Press Ctrl+K to search"
                    class="form-control nb-text-transparent"
                    name="q"
                    type="search"
                    value=""
                />
                <span class="align-items-center d-inline-flex gap-6 overflow-hidden px-12 py-6 pe-none position-absolute start-0 top-0 user-select-none w-100">
                    <span aria-hidden="true" class="mdi mdi-magnify text-secondary d-inline-flex"></span>

                                        <span class="badge border" data-nb-link="/plugins/nautobot-igp-models/ospf-configuration/"><!--
                                            -->in: OSPF Configuration<!--

        <main class="container-fluid wrapper" id="main-content" tabindex="-1">

                    Actions
                    <span class="mdi mdi-chevron-down" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                </button>

                <input type="hidden" name="content_type" value="194">
                <input type="hidden" name="query_string" value="id=190dd2b2-5bc8-499a-adcf-9d536e48d29a">
                <input type="hidden" name="_schedule_type" value="immediately">
                <input type="hidden" name="export_format" value="csv">
                <button class="dropdown-item" type="submit">
                    <span class="mdi mdi-database-export text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></span> Export as CSV
                </button>
            </form>
        </li>
        
    


                    
                
            </ul>
        </div>
        
        
        
            
            
        
        <div class="align-items-center d-flex gap-4">
            
                <button
                    type="button"
                    class="btn position-relative text-secondary"
                    data-nb-toggle="drawer"
                    data-nb-target="#SavedViews_drawer"
                    title="Saved Views"
                    aria-expanded="false"
                    aria-controls="SavedViews_drawer"
                >
                    <span class="mdi mdi-view-compact-outline" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                    <span class="visually-hidden">Saved Views</span>
                    
                </button>

                    type="button"
                    class="btn position-relative text-secondary"
                    data-nb-toggle="drawer"
                    data-nb-target="#FilterForm_drawer"
                    title="Add Filters"
                    id="id__filterbtn"
                    aria-controls="FilterForm_drawer"
                    aria-expanded="false"
                >
                    <span class="mdi mdi-filter" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                    <span class="visually-hidden">Add Filters</span>
                    
                        <span aria-hidden="true" class="nb-btn-indicator"></span>
                    
                </button>
            
        </div>
    </div>

    

    <div>

        document.addEventListener(\'DOMContentLoaded\', () => {\n                const NON_FILTER_PARAMS = [\n                    \'all_filters_removed\',\n                    \'clear_view\',\n                    \'per_page\',\n                    \'saved_view\',\n                    \'sort\',\n                    \'table_changes_pending\',\n                ];\n\n                /**\n                 * Insert given `element` as `parent`\'s first child.\n                 * @param {HTMLElement} element - Element to be inserted.\n                 * @param {HTMLElement} parent - Parent container for given `element`.\n                 * @returns {void} Do not return any value, modify DOM in-place.\n                 */\n                const insertFirst = (element, parent) => {\n                    parent.hasChildNodes() ? parent.insertBefore(element, parent.firstElementChild) : parent.appendChild(element);\n                };\n\n                /**\n                 * Get HTML elements for default and dynamic filter forms.\n                 * @returns {object} Object with `defaultFilterForm` and `dynamicFilterForm` HTML elements or `null`,\n                 *   depending on their actual existence in the DOM.\n                 */\n                const getFilterForms = () => ({\n                    defaultFilterForm: document.querySelector(\'#default-filter form\'),\n                    dynamicFilterForm: document.querySelector(\'#dynamic-filter-form\'),\n                });\n\n                const prepopulateFilterSelectsFromURL = (() => {\n                    const { defaultFilterForm } = getFilterForms();\n                    const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\n                    // Only target Select2 controls inside the default filter form.\n                    [...defaultFilterForm.querySelectorAll(\'select.nautobot-select2-multi-value-char\')].forEach((el) => {\n                        const name = el.getAttribute(\'name\');\n                        if (!name) { return; }\n                        const values = urlParams.getAll(name);\n                        if (!values.length) { return; }\n                        values.forEach((val) => {\n                            let found = Array.prototype.find.call(el.options, (opt) => {\n                                return String(opt.value) === String(val);\n                            });\n                            if (found) {\n                                found.selected = true;\n                            } else {\n                                el.add(new Option(val, val, true, true));\n                            }\n                        });\n                        if (window.jQuery && $(el).data(\'select2\')) {\n                            $(el).trigger(\'change\');\n                        }\n                    });\n                })();\n\n                /**\n                 * Synchronize given `filter` value from default to dynamic filter form.\n                 * @param {string} name - Filter name.\n                 * @returns {void} Do not return any value, just set given field values.\n                 */\n                const syncDefaultToDynamic = (name) => {\n                    const { defaultFilterForm } = getFilterForms();\n\n                    const field = defaultFilterForm.querySelector(`[name="${name}"]`);\n                    const text = field?.closest(\'.nb-form-group\')?.querySelector(\'label\')?.innerText?.trim();\n                    /*\n                     * `manageDynamicFilter` takes an array of `{ text: string, value: string }` objects as `value`, so\n                     * regardless of field being a textbox, a single or multiple choice combobox, conversion is required:\n                     *   1. For combobox (i.e. `<select>`), iterate over selected options and map them to display `text`\n                     *     and underlying `value`.\n                     *   2. For textbox (i.e. `<input>` or `<textarea>`):\n                     *     1. Use entered value as both display `text` and underlying `value`.\n                     *     2. If field is empty, use an empty array.\n                     */\n                    const value =\n                        field?.tagName === \'SELECT\'\n                        ? [...field.selectedOptions].map((option) => ({ text: option.innerText, value: option.value }))\n                        : [...(field?.value ? [{ text: field.value, value: field.value }] : [])];\n\n                    manageDynamicFilter({ action: \'set\', name, text, value });\n                };\n\n                /**\n                 * Synchronize given `filter` value from dynamic to default filter form.\n                 * @param {string} name - Filter name.\n                 * @returns {void} Do not return any value, just set given field values.\n                 */\n                const syncDynamicToDefault = (name) => {\n                    const { defaultFilterForm, dynamicFilterForm } = getFilterForms();\n\n                    const current = [...dynamicFilterForm.querySelectorAll(`input[name="${name}"][type="hidden"]`)].map(\n                        (input) => ({\n                            text: [...(input.parentElement?.childNodes ?? [])].find((node) => node.nodeName === \'#text\')?.wholeText,\n                            value: input.getAttribute(\'value\'),\n                        }),\n                    );\n\n                    const sync = defaultFilterForm?.querySelector(`[name=${name}]`);\n\n                    if (sync?.tagName === \'INPUT\' || sync?.tagName === \'TEXTAREA\') {\n                        sync.value = current.length > 0 ? current[0].value : \'\';\n                    } else if (sync?.tagName === \'SELECT\') {\n                        window.nb.select2.setSelect2Value(sync, current);\n                    }\n                };\n\n                /**\n                 * Manage dynamic filter either by adding values to the existing selection or by setting passed values\n                 * regardless of previous selection.\n                 * @param {\'add\'|\'set\'} action - Use `\'add\'` to add given value to the existing selection; use `\'set\'`\n                 *   to set given value regardless of what was set previously.\n                 * @param {string} name - Filter field name.\n                 * @param {string} text - Filter display text.\n                 * @param {object[]} value - Array of objects containing `text` and `value` key-value pairs.\n                 */\n                const manageDynamicFilter = ({ action, name, text, value }) => {\n                    const { dynamicFilterForm } = getFilterForms();\n                    const items = dynamicFilterForm.querySelector(\'.nb-dynamic-filter-items\');\n\n                    const group = (() => {\n                        const existing = items.querySelector(`.nb-multi-badge[data-nb-field="${name}"]`);\n                        if (existing) {\n                            return existing;\n                        }\n\n                        const group = document.createElement(\'span\');\n                        group.classList.toggle(\'badge\', true);\n                        group.classList.toggle(\'nb-multi-badge\', true);\n                        group.setAttribute(\'data-nb-field\', name);\n\n                        const button = document.createElement(\'button\');\n                        button.classList.toggle(\'nb-dynamic-filter-remove\', true);\n                        button.setAttribute(\'type\', \'button\');\n\n                        const close = document.createElement(\'span\');\n                        close.classList.toggle(\'mdi\', true);\n                        close.classList.toggle(\'mdi-close\', true);\n                        close.setAttribute(\'aria-hidden\', \'true\');\n\n                        const remove = document.createElement(\'span\');\n                        remove.classList.toggle(\'visually-hidden\', true);\n                        remove.innerText = \'Remove All\';\n\n                        const children = document.createElement(\'span\');\n                        children.classList.toggle(\'nb-multi-badge-items\', true);\n\n                        button.appendChild(close);\n                        button.appendChild(remove);\n                        group.appendChild(button);\n                        group.insertAdjacentText(\'beforeend\', `${text}:`);\n                        group.appendChild(children);\n\n                        return group;\n                    })();\n\n                    const children = group.querySelector(\'.nb-multi-badge-items\');\n                    const existing = [...children.querySelectorAll(\'.badge[data-nb-value]\')];\n\n                    /*\n                     * Depending on `action` remove the following badges:\n                     *   1. For `\'add\'`, remove already existing filters with the same key-value pairs and re-create them later.\n                     *   2. For `\'set\'`, remove all existing filters of given key and apply only these passed as `values`.\n                     */\n                    const badgesToRemove =\n                        action === \'add\'\n                        ? existing.filter((badge) => value.some((item) => badge.getAttribute(\'data-nb-value\') === item.value))\n                        : existing;\n                    badgesToRemove.forEach((item) => children.removeChild(item));\n\n                    value.forEach(({ text, value }) => {\n                        const badge = document.createElement(\'span\');\n                        badge.classList.toggle(\'badge\', true);\n                        badge.setAttribute(\'data-nb-value\', value);\n\n                        const input = document.createElement(\'input\');\n                        input.setAttribute(\'name\', name);\n                        input.setAttribute(\'type\', \'hidden\');\n                        input.setAttribute(\'value\', value);\n\n                        const button = document.createElement(\'button\');\n                        button.classList.toggle(\'nb-dynamic-filter-remove\', true);\n                        button.setAttribute(\'type\', \'button\');\n\n                        const close = document.createElement(\'span\');\n                        close.classList.toggle(\'mdi\', true);\n                        close.classList.toggle(\'mdi-close\', true);\n                        close.setAttribute(\'aria-hidden\', \'true\');\n\n                        const remove = document.createElement(\'span\');\n                        remove.classList.toggle(\'visually-hidden\', true);\n                        remove.innerText = \'Remove\';\n\n                        button.appendChild(close);\n                        button.appendChild(remove);\n                        badge.appendChild(button);\n                        badge.insertAdjacentText(\'beforeend\', text);\n                        badge.appendChild(input);\n\n                        insertFirst(badge, children);\n                    });\n\n                    // If group already exists, remove it and later insert as the first child.\n                    if (items.contains(group)) {\n                        items.removeChild(group);\n                    }\n\n                    if (children.hasChildNodes()) {\n                        insertFirst(group, items);\n                    }\n                };\n\n                document.addEventListener(\'click\', (event) => {\n                    const { defaultFilterForm, dynamicFilterForm } = getFilterForms();\n\n                    const add = event.target.closest(\'button.nb-dynamic-filter-add\');\n                    if (add) {\n                        const field = dynamicFilterForm.querySelector(\'[name$="lookup_field"]\');\n                        const type = dynamicFilterForm.querySelector(\'[name$="lookup_type"]\');\n                        const value = [...dynamicFilterForm.querySelectorAll(\'.nb-form-group\')]\n                            .pop()\n                        ?.querySelector(\'input, select, textarea\');\n\n                        const isMissing = (control) =>\n                        control?.selectedOptions ? control.selectedOptions.length === 0 : !control?.value;\n                        if (isMissing(field) || isMissing(type) || isMissing(value)) {\n                            // Return early if selected filter is not complete (i.e. is missing lookup field, type or value).\n                            return;\n                        }\n\n                        const name = type.selectedOptions[0].value;\n                        const label = field.selectedOptions[0].innerText.trim();\n                        const suffix = type.selectedOptions[0].innerText.trim();\n                        const text = /\\(\\w+\\)/.test(suffix) ? `${label} ${suffix}` : label;\n                        const values =\n                            value?.getAttribute(\'multiple\') !== null\n                            ? [...value.selectedOptions].map((option) => ({ text: option.innerText.trim(), value: option.value }))\n                            : [{ text: value?.value, value: value?.value }];\n\n                        // If field exists in default filter form and is a single value input, use `\'set\'` action.\n                        const action =\n                            defaultFilterForm.querySelector(`[name="${name}"]`) &&\n                        (value.tagName === \'INPUT\' || value.tagName === \'TEXTAREA\')\n                            ? \'set\'\n                            : \'add\';\n                        manageDynamicFilter({ action, name, text, value: values });\n\n                        syncDynamicToDefault(name);\n                    }\n\n                    const remove = event.target.closest(\'button.nb-dynamic-filter-remove\');\n                    if (remove) {\n                        const badge = remove.closest(\'.badge\');\n                        /*\n                         * Remove the group badge (i.e. multi-badge) when given badge is the group badge itself, or it is the only\n                         * one left in the group (i.e. has no siblings) because removing it will leave the group badge empty anyway.\n                         */\n                        const shouldRemoveGroup =\n                            badge?.classList.contains(\'nb-multi-badge\') ||\n                        (!badge?.previousElementSibling && !badge?.nextElementSibling);\n                        shouldRemoveGroup ? badge?.closest(\'.nb-multi-badge\')?.remove() : badge?.remove();\n\n                        syncDynamicToDefault(badge?.querySelector(\'input[type="hidden"]\')?.getAttribute(\'name\'));\n                    }\n                });\n\n                // Need to wrap `document` with jQuery to be able to listen to Select2 `change` event.\n                $(document).on(\'change\', (event) => {\n                    const { defaultFilterForm } = getFilterForms();\n                    const isDefaultFilterFormField = event.target.form === defaultFilterForm;\n                    if (isDefaultFilterFormField) {\n                        syncDefaultToDynamic(event.target.name);\n                    }\n                });\n\n                // Need to wrap `document` with jQuery to be able to listen to Select2 `change` event.\n                $(document).on(\'change\', async (event) => {\n                    const isLookupType = event.target.getAttribute(\'name\')?.endsWith(\'lookup_type\');\n                    if (isLookupType) {\n                        const content_type = event.target.getAttribute(\'data-contenttype\');\n                        const field_name = event.target.value;\n                        const value = [...event.target.form.querySelectorAll(\'.nb-form-group\')]\n                            .pop()\n                        ?.querySelector(\'input, select, textarea\');\n\n                        if (field_name) {\n                            const replacement = await (async () => {\n                                try {\n                                    const response = await window.fetch(\n                                        `/api/ui/core/filterset-fields/lookup-value-dom-element/?${new URLSearchParams({ content_type, field_name })}`,\n                                        { method: \'GET\', headers: { Accept: \'*/*\' } },\n                                    );\n\n                                    const html = await response.json();\n\n                                    const element = document.createElement(\'div\');\n                                    element.innerHTML = html;\n\n                                    return element.firstElementChild;\n                                } catch (exception) {\n                                    // Default to `<input type="text" ...>` field if error occurs.\n                                    const input = document.createElement(\'input\');\n                                    input.classList.toggle(\'lookup_value-input\', true);\n                                    input.classList.toggle(\'form-control\', true);\n                                    input.setAttribute(\'id\', `id_for_${field_name}`);\n                                    input.setAttribute(\'name\', field_name);\n                                    input.setAttribute(\'type\', \'text\');\n                                    return input;\n                                }\n                            })();\n\n                            value.replaceWith(replacement);\n                            replacement.nextElementSibling?.remove(); // Remove Select2 widget if present.\n                            replacement.previousElementSibling?.setAttribute(\'for\', replacement.getAttribute(\'id\')); // Set label `for` attribute to match field `id`.\n                            initializeInputs(replacement.parentElement);\n                        }\n                    }\n                });\n\n                // Need to wrap `document` with jQuery to be able to listen to Select2 `change` event.\n                $(document).on(\'change\', (event) => {\n                    const isLookupField = event.target.getAttribute(\'name\')?.endsWith(\'lookup_field\');\n                    const isLookupType = event.target.getAttribute(\'name\')?.endsWith(\'lookup_type\');\n\n                    if (isLookupField) {\n                        const type = event.target.form.querySelector(\'[name$="lookup_type"]\');\n                        $(type).val(null).trigger(\'change\');\n                    }\n\n                    if (isLookupField || isLookupType) {\n                        const value = [...event.target.form.querySelectorAll(\'.nb-form-group\')]\n                            .pop()\n                        ?.querySelector(\'input, select, textarea\');\n\n                        if (value.tagName === \'SELECT\') {\n                            $(value).val(null).trigger(\'change\');\n                        } else {\n                            value.value = \'\';\n                        }\n                    }\n                });\n\n                const isFilterForm = (target) => Boolean(target?.closest(\'#FilterForm_drawer\'));\n\n                document.addEventListener(\'reset\', (event) => {\n                    if (isFilterForm(event.target)) {\n                        event.preventDefault();\n\n                        // Remove all filter query params from location search while keeping non-filter params intact.\n                        const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\n                        const nextSearchParams = new URLSearchParams([\n                            ...[...searchParams].filter(\n                                ([property]) => NON_FILTER_PARAMS.includes(property) && property !== \'all_filters_removed\',\n                            ),\n                            [\'all_filters_removed\', \'true\'],\n                        ]);\n\n                        location.assign(`?${nextSearchParams}`);\n                    }\n                });\n\n                document.addEventListener(\'submit\', (event) => {\n                    if (isFilterForm(event.target)) {\n                        event.preventDefault();\n\n                        const { defaultFilterForm, dynamicFilterForm } = getFilterForms();\n\n                        /*\n                         * Just before the form submission automatically add filter selected in "Advanced" tab (if any)\n                         * which hasn\'t been manually applied for whatever reason (usually forgetfulness, speed, etc.).\n                         * This is a requested UX flavor.\n                         */\n                        const add = dynamicFilterForm.querySelector(\'button.nb-dynamic-filter-add\');\n                        add.click();\n\n                        // Remove all field names which are not applied filters container descendants.\n                        [...dynamicFilterForm.querySelectorAll(\'input, select, textarea\')].forEach((field) =>\n                            field.closest(\'.nb-dynamic-filter-items\') ? undefined : field.removeAttribute(\'name\'),\n                        );\n\n                        /*\n                         * Get the serialized data from the forms and:\n                         *   1) Filter out query params which values are empty e.g `?sam=&dan=2` becomes `dan=2`.\n                         *   2) Combine the two forms into a single set of data without duplicate entries.\n                         */\n                        const defaultFilterFormSearchParams = new URLSearchParams(new FormData(defaultFilterForm));\n                        const dynamicFilterFormSearchParams = new URLSearchParams(new FormData(dynamicFilterForm));\n                        const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\n\n                        const nextSearchParams = new URLSearchParams([\n                            ...[...defaultFilterFormSearchParams].filter(([, value]) => value !== \'\'),\n                            ...[...dynamicFilterFormSearchParams].filter(\n                                ([property, value]) => value !== \'\' && !defaultFilterFormSearchParams.has(property, value),\n                            ),\n                            ...[...searchParams].filter(\n                                ([property]) => NON_FILTER_PARAMS.includes(property) && property !== \'all_filters_removed\',\n                            ),\n                        ]);\n\n                        if (nextSearchParams.has(\'saved_view\')) {\n                            const all_filters_removed = [...nextSearchParams].every(([property]) =>\n                                NON_FILTER_PARAMS.includes(property),\n                            );\n\n                            if (all_filters_removed) {\n                                nextSearchParams.set(\'all_filters_removed\', \'true\');\n                            }\n                        }\n\n                        location.assign(`?${nextSearchParams}`);\n                    }\n                });\n\n                const onSubmitOrReset = (event) => (isFilterForm(event.target) ? window.nb?.history?.saveState() : undefined);\n                document.addEventListener(\'reset\', onSubmitOrReset);\n                document.addEventListener(\'submit\', onSubmitOrReset);\n            });\n        })();\n    </script>\n\n\n    \n        \n\n\n<section class="nb-drawer" tabindex="-1" id="OSPFConfigurationTable_config">\n    <div class="nb-drawer-header">\n        <h1>Table Configuration</h1>\n        <button type="button"         <div id="drawer">

    <script>
        (() => {
            document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
                const NON_FILTER_PARAMS = [
                    'all_filters_removed',
                    'clear_view',
                    'per_page',
                    'saved_view',
                    'sort',
                    'table_changes_pending',
                ];

                /**
                 * Insert given `element` as `parent`'s first child.
                 * @param {HTMLElement} element - Element to be inserted.
                 * @param {HTMLElement} parent - Parent container for given `element`.
                 * @returns {void} Do not return any value, modify DOM in-place.
                 */
                const insertFirst = (element, parent) => {
                    parent.hasChildNodes() ? parent.insertBefore(element, parent.firstElementChild) : parent.appendChild(element);
                };

                /**
                 * Get HTML elements for default and dynamic filter forms.
                 * @returns {object} Object with `defaultFilterForm` and `dynamicFilterForm` HTML elements or `null`,
                 *   depending on their actual existence in the DOM.
                 */
                const getFilterForms = () => ({
                    defaultFilterForm: document.querySelector('#default-filter form'),
                    dynamicFilterForm: document.querySelector('#dynamic-filter-form'),
                });

                const prepopulateFilterSelectsFromURL = (() => {
                    const { defaultFilterForm } = getFilterForms();
                    const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
                    // Only target Select2 controls inside the default filter form.
                    [...defaultFilterForm.querySelectorAll('select.nautobot-select2-multi-value-char')].forEach((el) => {
                        const name = el.getAttribute('name');
                        if (!name) { return; }
                        const values = urlParams.getAll(name);
                        if (!values.length) { return; }
                        values.forEach((val) => {
                            let found = Array.prototype.find.call(el.options, (opt) => {
                                return String(opt.value) === String(val);
                            });
                            if (found) {
                                found.selected = true;
                            } else {
                                el.add(new Option(val, val, true, true));
                            }
                        });
                        if (window.jQuery && $(el).data('select2')) {
                            $(el).trigger('change');
                        }
                    });
                })();

                /**
                 * Synchronize given `filter` value from default to dynamic filter form.
                 * @param {string} name - Filter name.
                 * @returns {void} Do not return any value, just set given field values.
                 */
                const syncDefaultToDynamic = (name) => {
                    const { defaultFilterForm } = getFilterForms();

                    const field = defaultFilterForm.querySelector(`[name="${name}"]`);
                    const text = field?.closest('.nb-form-group')?.querySelector('label')?.innerText?.trim();
                    /*
                     * `manageDynamicFilter` takes an array of `{ text: string, value: string }` objects as `value`, so
                     * regardless of field being a textbox, a single or multiple choice combobox, conversion is required:
                     *   1. For combobox (i.e. `<select>`), iterate over selected options and map them to display `text`
                     *     and underlying `value`.
                     *   2. For textbox (i.e. `<input>` or `<textarea>`):
                     *     1. Use entered value as both display `text` and underlying `value`.
                     *     2. If field is empty, use an empty array.
                     */
                    const value =
                        field?.tagName === 'SELECT'
                        ? [...field.selectedOptions].map((option) => ({ text: option.innerText, value: option.value }))
                        : [...(field?.value ? [{ text: field.value, value: field.value }] : [])];

                    manageDynamicFilter({ action: 'set', name, text, value });
                };

                /**
                 * Synchronize given `filter` value from dynamic to default filter form.
                 * @param {string} name - Filter name.
                 * @returns {void} Do not return any value, just set given field values.
                 */
                const syncDynamicToDefault = (name) => {
                    const { defaultFilterForm, dynamicFilterForm } = getFilterForms();

                    const current = [...dynamicFilterForm.querySelectorAll(`input[name="${name}"][type="hidden"]`)].map(
                        (input) => ({
                            text: [...(input.parentElement?.childNodes ?? [])].find((node) => node.nodeName === '#text')?.wholeText,
                            value: input.getAttribute('value'),
                        }),
                    );

                    const sync = defaultFilterForm?.querySelector(`[name=${name}]`);

                    if (sync?.tagName === 'INPUT' || sync?.tagName === 'TEXTAREA') {
                        sync.value = current.length > 0 ? current[0].value : '';
                    } else if (sync?.tagName === 'SELECT') {
                        window.nb.select2.setSelect2Value(sync, current);
                    }
                };

                /**
                 * Manage dynamic filter either by adding values to the existing selection or by setting passed values
                 * regardless of previous selection.
                 * @param {'add'|'set'} action - Use `'add'` to add given value to the existing selection; use `'set'`
                 *   to set given value regardless of what was set previously.
                 * @param {string} name - Filter field name.
                 * @param {string} text - Filter display text.
                 * @param {object[]} value - Array of objects containing `text` and `value` key-value pairs.
                 */
                const manageDynamicFilter = ({ action, name, text, value }) => {
                    const { dynamicFilterForm } = getFilterForms();
                    const items = dynamicFilterForm.querySelector('.nb-dynamic-filter-items');

                    const group = (() => {
                        const existing = items.querySelector(`.nb-multi-badge[data-nb-field="${name}"]`);
                        if (existing) {
                            return existing;
                        }

                        const group = document.createElement('span');
                        group.classList.toggle('badge', true);
                        group.classList.toggle('nb-multi-badge', true);
                        group.setAttribute('data-nb-field', name);

                        const button = document.createElement('button');
                        button.classList.toggle('nb-dynamic-filter-remove', true);
                        button.setAttribute('type', 'button');

                        const close = document.createElement('span');
                        close.classList.toggle('mdi', true);
                        close.classList.toggle('mdi-close', true);
                        close.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true');

                        const remove = document.createElement('span');
                        remove.classList.toggle('visually-hidden', true);
                        remove.innerText = 'Remove All';

                        const children = document.createElement('span');
                        children.classList.toggle('nb-multi-badge-items', true);

                        button.appendChild(close);
                        button.appendChild(remove);
                        group.appendChild(button);
                        group.insertAdjacentText('beforeend', `${text}:`);
                        group.appendChild(children);

                        return group;
                    })();

                    const children = group.querySelector('.nb-multi-badge-items');
                    const existing = [...children.querySelectorAll('.badge[data-nb-value]')];

                    /*
                     * Depending on `action` remove the following badges:
                     *   1. For `'add'`, remove already existing filters with the same key-value pairs and re-create them later.
                     *   2. For `'set'`, remove all existing filters of given key and apply only these passed as `values`.
                     */
                    const badgesToRemove =
                        action === 'add'
                        ? existing.filter((badge) => value.some((item) => badge.getAttribute('data-nb-value') === item.value))
                        : existing;
                    badgesToRemove.forEach((item) => children.removeChild(item));

                    value.forEach(({ text, value }) => {
                        const badge = document.createElement('span');
                        badge.classList.toggle('badge', true);
                        badge.setAttribute('data-nb-value', value);

                        const input = document.createElement('input');
                        input.setAttribute('name', name);
                        input.setAttribute('type', 'hidden');
                        input.setAttribute('value', value);

                        const button = document.createElement('button');
                        button.classList.toggle('nb-dynamic-filter-remove', true);
                        button.setAttribute('type', 'button');

                        const close = document.createElement('span');
                        close.classList.toggle('mdi', true);
                        close.classList.toggle('mdi-close', true);
                        close.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true');

                        const remove = document.createElement('span');
                        remove.classList.toggle('visually-hidden', true);
                        remove.innerText = 'Remove';

                        button.appendChild(close);
                        button.appendChild(remove);
                        badge.appendChild(button);
                        badge.insertAdjacentText('beforeend', text);
                        badge.appendChild(input);

                        insertFirst(badge, children);
                    });

                    // If group already exists, remove it and later insert as the first child.
                    if (items.contains(group)) {
                        items.removeChild(group);
                    }

                    if (children.hasChildNodes()) {
                        insertFirst(group, items);
                    }
                };

                document.addEventListener('click', (event) => {
                    const { defaultFilterForm, dynamicFilterForm } = getFilterForms();

                    const add = event.target.closest('button.nb-dynamic-filter-add');
                    if (add) {
                        const field = dynamicFilterForm.querySelector('[name$="lookup_field"]');
                        const type = dynamicFilterForm.querySelector('[name$="lookup_type"]');
                        const value = [...dynamicFilterForm.querySelectorAll('.nb-form-group')]
                            .pop()
                        ?.querySelector('input, select, textarea');

                        const isMissing = (control) =>
                        control?.selectedOptions ? control.selectedOptions.length === 0 : !control?.value;
                        if (isMissing(field) || isMissing(type) || isMissing(value)) {
                            // Return early if selected filter is not complete (i.e. is missing lookup field, type or value).
                            return;
                        }

                        const name = type.selectedOptions[0].value;
                        const label = field.selectedOptions[0].innerText.trim();
                        const suffix = type.selectedOptions[0].innerText.trim();
                        const text = /\(\w+\)/.test(suffix) ? `${label} ${suffix}` : label;
                        const values =
                            value?.getAttribute('multiple') !== null
                            ? [...value.selectedOptions].map((option) => ({ text: option.innerText.trim(), value: option.value }))
                            : [{ text: value?.value, value: value?.value }];

                        // If field exists in default filter form and is a single value input, use `'set'` action.
                        const action =
                            defaultFilterForm.querySelector(`[name="${name}"]`) &&
                        (value.tagName === 'INPUT' || value.tagName === 'TEXTAREA')
                            ? 'set'
                            : 'add';
                        manageDynamicFilter({ action, name, text, value: values });

                        syncDynamicToDefault(name);
                    }

                    const remove = event.target.closest('button.nb-dynamic-filter-remove');
                    if (remove) {
                        const badge = remove.closest('.badge');
                        /*
                         * Remove the group badge (i.e. multi-badge) when given badge is the group badge itself, or it is the only
                         * one left in the group (i.e. has no siblings) because removing it will leave the group badge empty anyway.
                         */
                        const shouldRemoveGroup =
                            badge?.classList.contains('nb-multi-badge') ||
                        (!badge?.previousElementSibling && !badge?.nextElementSibling);
                        shouldRemoveGroup ? badge?.closest('.nb-multi-badge')?.remove() : badge?.remove();

                        syncDynamicToDefault(badge?.querySelector('input[type="hidden"]')?.getAttribute('name'));
                    }
                });

                // Need to wrap `document` with jQuery to be able to listen to Select2 `change` event.
                $(document).on('change', (event) => {
                    const { defaultFilterForm } = getFilterForms();
                    const isDefaultFilterFormField = event.target.form === defaultFilterForm;
                    if (isDefaultFilterFormField) {
                        syncDefaultToDynamic(event.target.name);
                    }
                });

                // Need to wrap `document` with jQuery to be able to listen to Select2 `change` event.
                $(document).on('change', async (event) => {
                    const isLookupType = event.target.getAttribute('name')?.endsWith('lookup_type');
                    if (isLookupType) {
                        const content_type = event.target.getAttribute('data-contenttype');
                        const field_name = event.target.value;
                        const value = [...event.target.form.querySelectorAll('.nb-form-group')]
                            .pop()
                        ?.querySelector('input, select, textarea');

                        if (field_name) {
                            const replacement = await (async () => {
                                try {
                                    const response = await window.fetch(
                                        `/api/ui/core/filterset-fields/lookup-value-dom-element/?${new URLSearchParams({ content_type, field_name })}`,
                                        { method: 'GET', headers: { Accept: '*/*' } },
                                    );

                                    const html = await response.json();

                                    const element = document.createElement('div');
                                    element.innerHTML = html;

                                    return element.firstElementChild;
                                } catch (exception) {
                                    // Default to `<input type="text" ...>` field if error occurs.
                                    const input = document.createElement('input');
                                    input.classList.toggle('lookup_value-input', true);
                                    input.classList.toggle('form-control', true);
                                    input.setAttribute('id', `id_for_${field_name}`);
                                    input.setAttribute('name', field_name);
                                    input.setAttribute('type', 'text');
                                    return input;
                                }
                            })();

                            value.replaceWith(replacement);
                            replacement.nextElementSibling?.remove(); // Remove Select2 widget if present.
                            replacement.previousElementSibling?.setAttribute('for', replacement.getAttribute('id')); // Set label `for` attribute to match field `id`.
                            initializeInputs(replacement.parentElement);
                        }
                    }
                });

                // Need to wrap `document` with jQuery to be able to listen to Select2 `change` event.
                $(document).on('change', (event) => {
                    const isLookupField = event.target.getAttribute('name')?.endsWith('lookup_field');
                    const isLookupType = event.target.getAttribute('name')?.endsWith('lookup_type');

                    if (isLookupField) {
                        const type = event.target.form.querySelector('[name$="lookup_type"]');
                        $(type).val(null).trigger('change');
                    }

                    if (isLookupField || isLookupType) {
                        const value = [...event.target.form.querySelectorAll('.nb-form-group')]
                            .pop()
                        ?.querySelector('input, select, textarea');

                        if (value.tagName === 'SELECT') {
                            $(value).val(null).trigger('change');
                        } else {
                            value.value = '';
                        }
                    }
                });

                const isFilterForm = (target) => Boolean(target?.closest('#FilterForm_drawer'));

                document.addEventListener('reset', (event) => {
                    if (isFilterForm(event.target)) {
                        event.preventDefault();

                        // Remove all filter query params from location search while keeping non-filter params intact.
                        const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
                        const nextSearchParams = new URLSearchParams([
                            ...[...searchParams].filter(
                                ([property]) => NON_FILTER_PARAMS.includes(property) && property !== 'all_filters_removed',
                            ),
                            ['all_filters_removed', 'true'],
                        ]);

                        location.assign(`?${nextSearchParams}`);
                    }
                });

                document.addEventListener('submit', (event) => {
                    if (isFilterForm(event.target)) {
                        event.preventDefault();

                        const { defaultFilterForm, dynamicFilterForm } = getFilterForms();

                        /*
                         * Just before the form submission automatically add filter selected in "Advanced" tab (if any)
                         * which hasn't been manually applied for whatever reason (usually forgetfulness, speed, etc.).
                         * This is a requested UX flavor.
                         */
                        const add = dynamicFilterForm.querySelector('button.nb-dynamic-filter-add');
                        add.click();

                        // Remove all field names which are not applied filters container descendants.
                        [...dynamicFilterForm.querySelectorAll('input, select, textarea')].forEach((field) =>
                            field.closest('.nb-dynamic-filter-items') ? undefined : field.removeAttribute('name'),
                        );

                        /*
                         * Get the serialized data from the forms and:
                         *   1) Filter out query params which values are empty e.g `?sam=&dan=2` becomes `dan=2`.
                         *   2) Combine the two forms into a single set of data without duplicate entries.
                         */
                        const defaultFilterFormSearchParams = new URLSearchParams(new FormData(defaultFilterForm));
                        const dynamicFilterFormSearchParams = new URLSearchParams(new FormData(dynamicFilterForm));
                        const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);

                        const nextSearchParams = new URLSearchParams([
                            ...[...defaultFilterFormSearchParams].filter(([, value]) => value !== ''),
                            ...[...dynamicFilterFormSearchParams].filter(
                                ([property, value]) => value !== '' && !defaultFilterFormSearchParams.has(property, value),
                            ),
                            ...[...searchParams].filter(
                                ([property]) => NON_FILTER_PARAMS.includes(property) && property !== 'all_filters_removed',
                            ),
                        ]);

                        if (nextSearchParams.has('saved_view')) {
                            const all_filters_removed = [...nextSearchParams].every(([property]) =>
                                NON_FILTER_PARAMS.includes(property),
                            );

                            if (all_filters_removed) {
                                nextSearchParams.set('all_filters_removed', 'true');
                            }
                        }

                        location.assign(`?${nextSearchParams}`);
                    }
                });

                const onSubmitOrReset = (event) => (isFilterForm(event.target) ? window.nb?.history?.saveState() : undefined);
                document.addEventListener('reset', onSubmitOrReset);
                document.addEventListener('submit', onSubmitOrReset);
            });
        })();
    </script>


    
        


<section class="nb-drawer" tabindex="-1" id="OSPFConfigurationTable_config">
    <div class="nb-drawer-header">
        <h1>Table Configuration</h1>
        <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-nb-dismiss="drawer" aria-label="Close"></button>
    </div>
    <div class="nb-drawer-body">
        <form class="userconfigform h-100 pb-20 px-20 vstack" data-config-root="tables.OSPFConfigurationTable">

                    <div class="alert alert-warning">

                        </a>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-12">

  <option value="instance" selected>Instance</option>

  <option value="dynamic_group_count">Dynamic Groups</option>

</select>
                        <span class="form-text mt-8">Use the buttons below to arrange columns in the desired order, then select all columns to display.</span>
                        <div class="hstack gap-4 mt-8 mx-n4">

                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-success btn-sm" id="select-all-options" data-target="id_columns"><span class="mdi mdi-expand-all-outline me-4"></span>Select all</button>

                <input type="submit" class="btn btn-primary" value="Save">
                <input type="submit" class="btn btn-danger reset" value="Reset">
            </div>
        </form>
    </div>
</section>


    <script>
        (() => {
            document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
                document.addEventListener('submit', (event) => {
                    if (event.target.closest('#OSPFConfigurationTable_config')) {
                        // Keep the drawer open after page reload caused by form submission.
                        window.nb.history.saveState();
                    }
                });
            });
        })();
    </script>

                <div class="row">
                    <div id="page-title" class="col-4">

        <form action="/search/" class="col-4 text-center" id="header_search" method="get" role="search">
            <label class="position-relative w-100">
                <input
                    aria-placeholder="Press Ctrl+K to search"
                    class="form-control nb-text-transparent"
                    name="q"
                    type="search"
                    value=""
                />
                <span class="align-items-center d-inline-flex gap-6 overflow-hidden px-12 py-6 pe-none position-absolute start-0 top-0 user-select-none w-100">
                    <span aria-hidden="true" class="mdi mdi-magnify text-secondary d-inline-flex"></span>

                                            -->in: OSPF Configuration<!--

                <li><a class="dropdown-item" href="/user/profile/"><span class="mdi mdi-account-box"></span>Profile</a></li>

        </header>
        <main class="container-fluid wrapper" id="main-content" tabindex="-1">
            
    <div class="align-items-center d-flex gap-8 justify-content-end mb-16 d-print-none">

                <button type="button" id="actions-dropdown" class="btn btn-primary dropdown-toggle" data-bs-toggle="dropdown">
                    Actions
                    <span class="mdi mdi-chevron-down" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                </button>
            
            <ul class="dropdown-menu dropdown-menu-end" role="menu">
